EmailTemplate.name: Certification-Notification On Admin Rejection
EmailTemplate.subject: Notification To The Trainer/Requestor
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Qualification__c.CreatedBy},
Please note that the Nomination for Account "{!Qualification__c.Account_Name__c}" is Rejected by DuPont Admin.Please provide the required information as mentioned in Nomination Record
Click on this link to access account. Please contact DuPont Admin if you have questions.
